data.name: Sample - Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud - 1.0.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Get All Indicators List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all indicators from FortiNDR cloud based on the rule UUID and other input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get All Indicators List

workflows.name: Get All Detections List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all detections from FortiNDR cloud based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get All Detections List

workflows.name: Resolve Detection
workflows.description: Resolve a details for specific detection from FortiNDR cloud based on the detection UUID, resolution, and other input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Resolve Detection

workflows.name: Get Network Telemetry Details
workflows.description: Retrieves details for network telemetry from FortiNDR cloud based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get Network Telemetry Details

workflows.name: Get All Deny List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all deny in FortiNDR cloud based on the account UUID you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get All Deny List

workflows.name: Update Deny List
workflows.description: Updates a new IP deny list in FortiNDR cloud based on the account UUID and IP blacklist that you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Update Deny List

workflows.name: Delete Deny List
workflows.description: Deletes a list of deny in FortiNDR cloud based on the account UUID you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Delete Deny List

workflows.name: Get All Sensors List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all sensors or specific sensor from FortiNDR cloud based on the input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get All Sensors List

workflows.name: Get Entity Tracking
workflows.description: Retrieves a summary information about an IP address, MAC address, or Host name from FortiNDR cloud based on the entity type, entity value, input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get Entity Tracking

workflows.name: Get All Detection Rules List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all the detection rules from FortiNDR cloud based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get All Detection Rules List

routes.name: Start-> Get All Detection Rules List

workflows.name: Get All Detection Rule Events List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all events for a specific detection rule from FortiNDR cloud based on the rule UUID and other input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get All Detection Rule Events List

steps.name: Get All Detection Rule Events List

arguments.name: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud
arguments.operationTitle: Get All Detection Rule Events List

routes.name: Start-> Get All Detection Rule Events List

workflows.name: Terminate PCAP Task
workflows.description: Stops a specific, currently running PCAP task from FortiNDR cloud based on the task UUID that you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Terminate PCAP Task

workflows.name: Get All Events List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all events from FortiNDR cloud based on the detection UUID and other input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get All Events List

workflows.name: Get All Devices List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all devices from FortiNDR cloud based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get All Devices List

workflows.name: Create Deny List
workflows.description: Creates a new IP deny list in FortiNDR cloud based on the account UUID and IP blacklist that you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Create Deny List

workflows.name: Delete PCAP Task
workflows.description: Permanently removes a specific PCAP task and all its associated files from FortiNDR cloud based on the task UUID that you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Delete PCAP Task

workflows.name: Get PCAP Tasks
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all the PCAP tasks or a specific PCAP task from FortiNDR cloud based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get PCAP Tasks

workflows.name: Delete IP from Deny List
workflows.description: Delete a specific IP from deny list in FortiNDR cloud based on the account UUID and IP address that you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Delete IP from Deny List

routes.name: Start-> Delete IP from Deny List

workflows.name: Get Passive DNS Details
workflows.description: Retrieves a passive DNS information about an IP address or domain from FortiNDR cloud based on the IP/Domain and other input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get Passive DNS Details

workflows.name: Get Events Telemetry Details
workflows.description: Retrieves details for events telemetry from FortiNDR cloud based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get Events Telemetry Details

workflows.name: Download PCAP Task File
workflows.description: Download a specific PCAP task file generated by the specified task from FortiNDR cloud based on the task UUID, and other input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Download PCAP Task File

workflows.name: Get Entity Summary
workflows.description: Retrieves a summary information about an IP address or domain from FortiNDR cloud based on the IP/Domain that you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get Entity Summary

workflows.name: Get Packetstats Telemetry Details
workflows.description: Retrieves details for packetstats telemetry from FortiNDR cloud based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiNDR Cloud: Get Packetstats Telemetry Details
